docstring.short_description: Return the merged RGBA channels of an image.

parameters.name: red
parameters.description: The red channel of the image.

parameters.name: green
parameters.description: The green channel of the image.

parameters.name: blue
parameters.description: The blue channel of the image.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: The alpha channel of the image.

returns.description:
The image with each channel given by the appropriate channel
on the respective inputs.
